comments:
Description:
When I use BIRT2.2.1 V20070831-0630 build. I found that when I create a filter on a crosstab, NPE throwed out. But after I restart the eclipse, the issue can not be reproduced. I have the log, may these log can help you to find may be there are some leak in our code to lead the NPE.

Works now. Please reopen it if it can be reproduced.

For Log1, I think it's model's bug. Since GUI calls model's APIs correctly, if it throws an exception, model should investigate it.

For log2, when calling MemberValueHandle.getLevel().getName(), the level is null. but in fact the level should not be null. In another word, model should ensure the  return value is not NULL. But in the view of preciseness, GUI should also check if the level is null before calling API LevelHandle.getName(). GUI can fix this, and the remaining belongs to model.

OK, since you can't reproduce this bug, set this bug as WORKSFORME temporarily. Please reopen it when it's reproduced.
hehe, I'll reassign it to model.
